content:
I'm soliciting review for this PR:

feat: improve polyrith by testing for membership in the radical #7790
I'm rather worried that none of the tests for polyrith currently work
(we never ported the meta code to support them)
I left a comment, other than that LGTM
The tests pass if you uncomment them, but yes, they don't play well with CI. It's certainly a to-do to port the polyrith testing infrastructure
If the tests pass when you uncomment them, then maybe it's not critical-level-red-urgent to fix the tests before merging a PR like this.
I agree, though I think we should explain that the tests were run that way in the commit message
